about_the_game:
game play

PAVOR is an online cooperative survival horror game for 1-4 players. You are a professional electrical repair and ghost exterminator, repairing broken houses and exterminating ghosts as requested.

Play with your friends/h2]
  • Online cooperative play for 1 to 4 players
　Work with your friends to fix the electricity in the house and exterminate the ghosts.

  • single-player
　There are no dependable companions, if you are caught, you are finished immediately, face your fears.

voice chat

　Just as in reality, your voice will be heard by your friends near you, but not those far away.


Confronting Ghosts

  • Use a strobe to temporarily stop the ghosting.
However, once the strobe is used, it cannot be used again until the fuse is picked up.

Early Access

  • New systems and maps will be added.
